Summary Table with Functional Measures

functional_measures_table.Rd

Summary Table with Functional Measures

Usage

functional_measures_table(dat, studyid = "102038g")

Arguments

dat

Data set to use; see demo_data for example

studyid

String giving participant id. Must be length 1 and one of the IDs in dat$cog_studyid.

Examples

functional_measures_table(demo_data, demo_data$cog_studyid[1])
